Coat rack with integrated storage: Incorporate a small storage compartment beneath the hooks for users to store their keys, wallet, and other small items.
Coat rack with built-in coat hooks: Attach hooks to the side of the rack for hanging coats, scarves, and hats.
Coat rack with built-in coat hangers: Install hangers that allow users to hang their coats and jackets, saving space and keeping their clothes from getting wrinkled.
Coat rack with built-in coat drying rack: Add a small coat drying rack to the bottom of the rack for users to dry their wet coats.
Coat rack with built-in coat hooks and coat drying rack: Combine the features of the first and fifth ideas to create a multi-functional coat rack.
